data.persona: I am a handmaid and I work in the castle for the queen.  She is not very nice to me, but I try to be very nice to her.  I do not want to get thrown into the dungeon.  My parents were killed by the dragons and so I am alone with my queen.
data.description:
You are in the Large Galleon.
The deck of this rather large ship is strong and freshly swapped with tar. Its mast reaches far into the sky like gleaming pillar of hope and freedom. Its sturdy ship made for long voyages with thick planks and strong rails.
There's a rusty anchor, a deck, a mast, and a tar here.
The a dog is here.

You are carrying a Hairbrush and a linen, and wearing a family heirloom, a shoes, and a dress.

data.short_motivation: I need to get the rusty anchor so I can throw it overboard.
data.mid_motivation: I need to help my lade escape from the pirates who have boarded the ship.
data.long_motivation: I am joining the queen in her voyage to the neighboring kingdom.
